DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy Neuroskin Forte relieve symptom dry skin adult psoriasis eczema .
DOC.brief_title: Neuroskin Forte Dry Skin Relief Eczema Psoriasis
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects apply study drug placebo spray 3 time day assign , randomize side body . They allow continue use prescription medication , moisturizers . Assessments perform every week . Total duration study 10 week ( 8 week treatment follow-up visit 2 week later ) .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Must least 18 year age Have psoriasis eczema side body , pair roughly symmetrical bilateral `` target '' lesion least 1.5 cm diameter Exclusion Criteria Inability understand consent form and/or comply requirement study Use moisturizers/emollients within 2 day begin study
